column4: Hello, pplz! I have a problem with my modem? Anybody can help me?
don't worry about windowmaker, just describe your problem.
i can't install drivers for my Conexant HSF modem
you're going to have to ask Linuxant to support Ubuntu.
sorry for my english, i am russian :)
just your choice of a support source is wrong :)
is there any another quit to my problem?
you're going to have to ask Linuxant to support Ubuntu.
that modem driver is commercial, closed software. Ubuntu people cannot support it.
stop! but it is work with 14/4 for free :)
this is all you're going to get from me, sorry.
if you have a problem with Ubuntu, ask here. If you have a problem with commercial software, ask the vendor of that software.
